    The black man acter died after the operation in New York.16:01
    Lannie Flaherty died 81 years after the operation in New York.
    World
    Palestine rejected the Netanyahu post-war plan for the Gaza Strip15:57
    In the Palestinian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Netanyahu Plan for Gaza was recognized as a reoccupation of the enclave, as well as an attempt to continue hostilities.
    World
    In siege. The economist revealed what Russia would do after new U.S. and EU sanctions.15:56
    The West has published new restrictions not only against the FM, but also from friendly countries.
    World
    In Baku, Pasinian ' s words about Azerbaijan ' s preparedness for war with Armenia were rejected.15:50
    The Azeri MFA called the baseless statements by Pasinian.
    World
    Telegraph: about 15,000 Ukrainian refugees in Britain became homeless15:48
    This represents approximately 7.5 per cent of the Ukrainians arriving in the country.
    World
    MFA reported on responses to the 13th anti-Russian sanctions package EU14:57
    In the Ministry, the European Union was called illegal.
    World
    El País: The Spanish authorities themselves issued forged documents to the Flight of Kuzminov.14:54
    However, no protection was provided to the interrogator.
    World
    They are not exchanged. Women soldiers were captured in Avdeevka14:54
    The politician believes that on the Russian side they are likely to be on the way to the end of the TSB.
    World
    The election of the President of Hungary will take place on 26 February14:41
    The President of the Constitutional Court of Tamash Shuyok may be the new President.
    World
    Americans were not interested in the Green TV Fox News interviews.14:23
    Nine hours after the publication of the video with the Ukrainian leader, less than 27,000 views were gained.
    World
    Byden confirmed that the United States imposed more than 500 sanctions against Russia14:20
    The measures, according to the President of the United States, are aimed at reducing the energy revenues of the Russian Federation.
    Policy
    El País: The Spanish regulator intends to fine the Booking by $530 million14:14
    The amount of the fine is record, but the final decision will not be announced before summer.
    Cases
    Unknown once again, Ukrainian cereals from wagons in Poland were ejected14:06
    Three granoses with a rash were opened.
    World
    The expert, Kevin, said that it was safe to see the victory of the RF.13:49
    The Australian expert pointed to the weakness of Kiev and the artificial existence of Ukraine at the expense of Western money.
    World
    The Verkhovna Rada adopted a draft law on the demobilization of slashers13:39
    The document was previously supported by the Ukrainian Parliament ' s National Security and Defence Committee.
    World
    Pashinyan stated that the Armenian authorities did not discuss the Russian base in the country13:15
    Pasinian expressed the view that the Collective Security Treaty on Armenia had not been implemented.
    World
    Peskov: The RF received no explanation from Armenia concerning the suspension of participation in the CSTO13:09
    In Kremla, it was hoped that Armenia would explain its decision.
    Policy
    Under the 13th EU sanctions package, there were 106 physical and 88 yurls.12:45
    Restrictive measures include freezing assets.
    World
    Europa Press: 60 farmers were detained in Spain during protests12:38
    The protests have continued in the country since 6 February.
    Society
    In Tajikistan, secondary education will become compulsory12:35
    The head of Tajikistan ' s Ministry of Education, Rahim Saidzod, is confident that new amendments to the law will make education more qualitative.

info.title: The black man acter died after the operation in New York.
info.short_text: Lannie Flaherty died 81 years after the operation in New York.

info.title: Palestine rejected the Netanyahu post-war plan for the Gaza Strip
info.short_text: In the Palestinian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Netanyahu Plan for Gaza was recognized as a reoccupation of the enclave, as well as an attempt to continue hostilities.

info.title: In siege. The economist revealed what Russia would do after new U.S. and EU sanctions.
info.short_text: The West has published new restrictions not only against the FM, but also from friendly countries.

info.title: In Baku, Pasinian ' s words about Azerbaijan ' s preparedness for war with Armenia were rejected.
info.short_text: The Azeri MFA called the baseless statements by Pasinian.

info.title: Telegraph: about 15,000 Ukrainian refugees in Britain became homeless
info.short_text: This represents approximately 7.5 per cent of the Ukrainians arriving in the country.

info.title: MFA reported on responses to the EU 13th anti-Russian sanctions package
info.short_text: In the Ministry, the European Union was called illegal.

info.title: El País: The Spanish authorities themselves issued forged documents to the Flight of Kuzminov.
info.short_text: However, no protection was provided to the interrogator.

info.title: They are not exchanged. Women soldiers were captured in Avdeevka
info.short_text: The politician believes that on the Russian side they are likely to be on the way to the end of the TSB.

info.title: The election of the President of Hungary will take place on 26 February
info.short_text: The President of the Constitutional Court of Tamash Shuyok may be the new President.

info.title: Americans were not interested in the Green TV Fox News interviews.
info.short_text: Nine hours after the publication of the video with the Ukrainian leader, less than 27,000 views were gained.

info.title: Byden confirmed that the United States imposed more than 500 sanctions against Russia
info.short_text: The measures, according to the President of the United States, are aimed at reducing the energy revenues of the Russian Federation.

info.title: El País: The Spanish regulator intends to fine the Booking by $530 million
info.short_text: The amount of the fine is record, but the final decision will not be announced before summer.

info.title: Unknown once again, Ukrainian cereals from wagons in Poland were ejected
info.short_text: Three granoses with a rash were opened.

info.title: The expert, Kevin, said that it was safe to see the victory of the RF.
info.short_text: The Australian expert pointed to the weakness of Kiev and the artificial existence of Ukraine at the expense of Western money.

info.title: The Verkhovna Rada adopted a draft law on the demobilization of slashers
info.short_text: The document was previously supported by the Ukrainian Parliament ' s National Security and Defence Committee.

info.title: Pashinyan stated that the Armenian authorities did not discuss the Russian base in the country
info.short_text: Pasinian expressed the view that the Collective Security Treaty on Armenia had not been implemented.

info.title: Peskov: The RF received no explanation from Armenia concerning the suspension of participation in the CSTO
info.short_text: In Kremla, it was hoped that Armenia would explain its decision.

info.title: Under the 13th EU sanctions package, there were 106 physical and 88 yurls.
info.short_text: Restrictive measures include freezing assets.

info.title: Europa Press: 60 farmers were detained in Spain during protests
info.short_text: The protests have continued in the country since 6 February.

info.title: In Tajikistan, secondary education will become compulsory
info.short_text: The head of Tajikistan ' s Ministry of Education, Rahim Saidzod, is confident that new amendments to the law will make education more qualitative.
